H0.text: Which author created the fictional character Moll Flanders . Henry Fielding

H1.text: Which author created the fictional character Moll Flanders . Samuel Richardson

H2.text: Which author created the fictional character Moll Flanders . Jonathan Swift

H3.text: Which author created the fictional character Moll Flanders . Daniel Foe

A4.text: It is usually assumed that the novel was written by Daniel Defoe

A5.text: The attribution of Moll Flanders to Defoe was made by bookseller Francis Noble in 1770, after Defoe's death in 1731
